name: TheUnluckyAdventuresofClassroom13
0:
”Alexa, open Classroom Thirteen.”
”Alexa, ask Classroom Thirteen for a story.”
”Alexa, ask Classroom Thirteen to tell me a story.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classroom thirteen
Developer Terms of Use
des:
For fans of Sideways Stories from Wayside School, Captain Underpants, and Roald Dahl, Classroom 13 is the perfect adventure for kids of all ages. 
 
Don't worry, there's no homework in Classroom 13, just weird, wacky, and wild adventures—that YOU get to choose! 

When unlucky teacher Ms. Linda LaCrosse finds a magic lamp, she releases a genie—sorry, djinn—who agrees to grant each of her students ONE WISH.

Now it's YOUR TURN! What would YOU do with one MAGIC WISH?

This interactive storytelling experience puts you in control as you choose where and how the story unfolds. Put on your fun hat and experience hundreds of unique adventures with the world’s wonkiest classroom. Just say "Alexa, open Classroom Thirteen" to get started.

If your children enjoy the audio adventures, make sure to check out the book series, starting with Texas Library Association’s 2018 Texas Bluebonnet Award nominee, The Unlucky Lottery Winners of Classroom 13!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
